isis.stitle: VT 365 Diesel Engine - 2004 Model Year - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVE TRAIN - Removal - Hydraulic Cam Followers

note.para: If cam followers must be removed, the rear cover and the high-pressure oil pump cover must be removed to gain access to the rear engine tube assembly. See "Rear Cover, Flywheel, and Power Steering gear Drive."

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, keep cam followers and push rods in the order removed. Install cam followers and push rods to original positions.

note.para: If the valve train operates quietly and hydraulic cam followers function satisfactorily, do not service cam followers.

step1.para: Remove the M6 x 15 bolt with washer from each roller follower guide.

note.para: Identify orientation of each cam follower and guide during disassembly.

figure.caption: Cam followers and roller follower guides

step1.para: Remove cam followers and roller follower, lifting the guide straight up. A hand tool may be required.

figure.caption: Cam follower removal from roller follower guide

step1.para: Remove cam followers from roller follower guide.
